tickets.summary: The Save button should be enabled when “NA” creative weight value is attached with a valid weight.
tickets.description: As a user, when I navigate to the Creative Edit tab of an Ad Group and add a creative with “NA” selected, the Save button should remain disabled.  If you’d like, I can also format it in proper “Given–When–Then” format.

tickets.summary: UI | Cleanup of Drop columns no longer required | Multi-Goal Prioritization GA
tickets.description:
In api  Drop column  goalId  from bidder.CAMPAIGN  Drop columns  goalTypeId  and  target  from bidder.CAMPAIGN_GROUP Remove  CampaignGoal  from  goalDetails  in CAMPAIGN_CUSTOM_TEMPLATE  Remove complete code dependency for the same  Remove  isOptimised  bidder.BUDGET column  Remove  isUniqueReachEnabled  bidder.CAMPAIGN_OPTIMIZER column  For UI We need to cleanup resolvers for old goalTypeId and target from following queries:  CAMPAIGN_GROUP_SEARCH_QUERY – via fragments.campaignGroup
CAMPAIGN_GROUP_SEARCH_WITH_CAMPAIGNS_QUERY – via fragments.campaignGroupForMultiGoal
CAMPAIGN_GROUP_LISTING_QUERY (schema) – via fragments.campaignGroup
CampaignGroupQuery.CAMPAIGN_GROUP_LISTING_QUERY – inline selection
CAMPAIGN_GROUP_ID_LIST – inline selection
GET_CAMPAIGN_DETAILS_FOR_AD_GROUP – inline selection
getCampaignsWithGoalDetails – via campaignGroup { goalTypeId }
NESTED_CG_AND_CLI_LIST – flat item structure including goalTypeId   Refer:

Login to fusion and then open outcomes_report_processor_priority  here check the dag run parameters for completed dag here eDt is passed as None   Observed Behaviour - Invalid eDt is passed in outcomes_report_processor_priority dag. Expected Results - Valid eDt should be passed in outcomes_report_processor_priority dag.

tickets.summary: Fetch conversation history for a chat
tickets.description: User story As a User, when I want to view my previous interactions, I want to fetch conversation history for my session so that I can review past discussions. Context This issue involves implementing a feature that allows users to access their conversation history during a session. This functionality is important for users to recall previous exchanges and maintain continuity in conversations. Acceptance criteria Users can successfully fetch their conversation history. The conversation history should display all interactions from the current session. The feature should be accessible from the user interface. Other information N/A
tickets.epic_name: Core Chat UI Shell (Cora Tab Only)

tickets.summary: Implement Cleanroom-Specific Keytab Based Workbench Listing
tickets.description: Description Currently, the listing on Workbench is powered by Redis and Spark, where Redis is refreshed daily using a single keytab, which is the DeepIntent cleanroom keytab on prod. The issue is that this keytab does not have access to databases and tables across all cleanrooms, due to which  columnData  is returned as null for tables that this keytab does not have access to. Proposed Solution We will move to a cleanroom-specific keytab based refresh mechanism. With this approach: Each cleanroom will use its own keytab to refresh the data sources associated with it Data sources and table information will be populated cleanroom-wise Queries will be executed using the corresponding DCR-specific keytab This will ensure correct access and non-null  columnData  for all tables across cleanrooms How database and dcr mapping works: Databases created via Workbench are registered in the  DATA_SOURCE_DATA_CLEAN_ROOM_MAPPING  table Databases created via backend are registered via the  refreshRedisCacheFromSpark  DAG, which inserts entries into the  DATA_SOURCE  table for the default cleanroom (10000 DCR) cc:

tickets.epic_name: Post-GA Release | Multi-Goal Improvements & Clean Up

tickets.description: Background We’re running into an issue where users are targeting the endemic package but their ad group is spending on non-endemic app inventory due to app targeting being on by default. This is unexpected by users and has even caused DeepIntent to have to pay clients a make good to cover the spend that was spent on non-endemic inventory. Requirements We need to update the logic so that: Only a single package can be targeted in a single ad group Continue to allow users to add additional inventory to the ad group that the package is targeted to (everything excluding packages) When the Endemic package is selected, turn OFF app targeting and do NOT let a user turn this on manually. When the Spanish package is selected, only target the deal IDs included (do NOT include site or app inclusion lists and do NOT select All Exchanges.)

Several small but impactful issues reduce reliability and maintainability, especially around serialization, concurrency, and testing. Scope / Tasks Replace all manual JSON string escaping with  json.dumps() Remove remaining global mutable state (e.g., trackers, graphs) Improve concurrency safety for async streaming Add unit tests for: Serialization edge cases Concurrent request handling Minor refactors to improve readability and testability
tickets.epic_name: Core Chat UI Shell (Cora Tab Only)
